text: Markar Esayan (4 February 1969 - 16 October 2020) was a Turkish author, journalist, and politician.Justice and Development Party website: He was a member of the Turkish Parliament for the Justice and Development Party representing Istanbul from 2015 until his death. He was born in Istanbul. Esayan died on 16 October 2020 in Istanbul from stomach cancer at the age of 51.Armenian-Turkish AK Party deputy, DS columnist Markar Esayan passes away ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Istanbul Category:Turkish journalists Category:Writers from Istanbul Category:Cancer deaths in Turkey Category:Deaths from stomach cancer
title: Markar Esayan
